<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106260</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106260</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086488</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Mr. Block.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Herr Block.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">M. Block.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sr. Obstrução.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sig. Block.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο κ. Block.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sr. Block.</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The Industrial Workers of the World (IWW), founded in 1905, sought to organize all workers into one big union" to abolish the wage system</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die industriellen Arbeiter der Welt (IWW), gegründet 
1905, suchten, alle Arbeiter in einen grossen Anschluß zu 
organisieren ", um das Lohnsystem abzuschaffen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les ouvriers industriels du monde (IWW), fondés en 1905, 
ont recherché à organiser tous les ouvriers en une grande union 
"pour supprimer le système de salaire</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os trabalhadores industriais do mundo (IWW), fundados em 
1905, procuraram organizar todos os trabalhadores em uma união grande
"para abolish o sistema do salário</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I lavoratori dell'industria del mondo (IWW), fondati in 
1905, hanno cercato di organizzare tutti gli operai in un'unione 
grande "per abolire il sistema dello stipendio</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι βιομηχανικοί εργάτες του κόσμου (IWW), που 
ιδρύθηκαν το 1905, επιδίωξαν να οργανώσουν όλους τους 
εργαζομένους σε μια μεγάλη ένωση "για να καταργήσουν το σύστημα 
αμοιβών</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los trabajadores industriales del mundo (IWW), fundados en
1905, intentaron ordenar a todos los trabajadores en una unión grande
"para suprimir el sistema del salario</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:CENTER FOR HISTORY AND NEW MEDIA/AMERICAN SOCIAL HISTORY PROJECT
FN:CENTER FOR HISTORY AND NEW MEDIA/AMERICAN SOCIAL HISTORY PROJECT
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086488</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">No License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106260</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/mr-block</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
